description:
The book Ren brought from Canada is one of Haru`s old favorites and a story about a lone gray wolf who meets a human he comes to recognize as his master. Already hating himself for making Ren say he`ll be "just a brother," Haru is dealt the final blow by Seika`s words. Meanwhile, Ren manages his school life with the help of his classmate Juuzen and Kondo Kiri, another student returned from abroad, but he collapses during a PE class...
Source: crunchyroll
